verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

וְאֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> to the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <WH3478> of Israel תֹּאמַר֒ <WH559> Again thou shalt say אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> Whosoever אִישׁ֩ <WH376> man מִבְּנֵ֨י <WH1121> [he be] of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel וּמִן־ <WH4480> any הַגֵּ֣ר ׀ <WH1616> or of the strangers הַגָּ֣ר <WH1481> that sojourn בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> in Israel אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who יִתֵּ֧ן <WH5414> that giveth מִזַּרְע֛וֹ <WH2233> [any] of his seed לַמֹּ֖לֶךְ <WH4432> unto Molech מ֣וֹת <WH4191> he shall surely יוּמָ֑ת <WH4191> be put to death עַ֥ם <WH5971> the people הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the land יִרְגְּמֻ֥הוּ <WH7275> shall stone בָאָֽבֶן׃ <WH68> him with stones

וַאֲנִ֞י <WH589> I אֶתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> And I will set אֶת־ <WH853> פָּנַי֙ <WH6440> my face בָּאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> against that man הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <WH3772> and will cut him off אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> מִקֶּ֣רֶב <WH7130> from among עַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> his people כִּ֤י <WH3588> because מִזַּרְעוֹ֙ <WH2233> of his seed נָתַ֣ן <WH5414> because he hath given לַמֹּ֔לֶךְ <WH4432> unto Molech לְמַ֗עַן <WH4616> so טַמֵּא֙ <WH2930> to defile אֶת־ <WH853> מִקְדָּשִׁ֔י <WH4720> my sanctuary וּלְחַלֵּ֖ל <WH2490> and to profane אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> name קָדְשִֽׁי׃ <WH6944> my holy

וְאִ֡ם <WH518> If הַעְלֵ֣ם <WH5956> do any ways יַעְלִימֽוּ֩ <WH5956> hide עַ֨ם <WH5971> And if the people הָאָ֜רֶץ <WH776> of the land אֶת־ <WH853> עֵֽינֵיהֶם֙ <WH5869> their eyes מִן־ <WH4480> any הָאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> from the man הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he בְּתִתּ֥וֹ <WH5414> when he giveth מִזַּרְע֖וֹ <WH2233> of his seed לַמֹּ֑לֶךְ <WH4432> unto Molech לְבִלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> him not הָמִ֥ית <WH4191> and kill אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

וְשַׂמְתִּ֨י <WH7760> Then I will set אֲנִ֧י <WH589> Myself אֶת־ <WH853> פָּנַ֛י <WH6440> my face בָּאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> against that man הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he וּבְמִשְׁפַּחְתּ֑וֹ <WH4940> and against his family וְהִכְרַתִּ֨י <WH3772> and will cut him off אֹת֜וֹ <WH853> וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַזֹּנִ֣ים <WH2181> and all that go a whoring אַחֲרָ֗יו <WH310> after לִזְנ֛וֹת <WH2181> him to commit whoredom אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> after הַמֹּ֖לֶךְ <WH4432> with Molech מִקֶּ֥רֶב <WH7130> from among עַמָּֽם׃ <WH5971> their people

וְהַנֶּ֗פֶשׁ <WH5315> And the soul אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who תִּפְנֶ֤ה <WH6437> that turneth אֶל־ <WH413> after הָֽאֹבֹת֙ <WH178> such as have familiar spirits וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to הַיִּדְּעֹנִ֔ים <WH3049> wizards לִזְנ֖וֹת <WH2181> to go a whoring אַחֲרֵיהֶ֑ם <WH310> and after וְנָתַתִּ֤י <WH5414> them I will even set אֶת־ <WH853> פָּנַי֙ <WH6440> my face בַּנֶּ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> against that soul הַהִ֔וא <WH1931> he וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <WH3772> and will cut him off אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> מִקֶּ֥רֶב <WH7130> from among עַמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5971> his people

וְהִ֨תְקַדִּשְׁתֶּ֔ם <WH6942> Sanctify וִהְיִיתֶ֖ם <WH1961> and be ye קְדֹשִׁ֑ים <WH6918> yourselves therefore and be ye holy כִּ֛י <WH3588> for אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּם֙ <WH8104> And ye shall keep אֶת־ <WH853> חֻקֹּתַ֔י <WH2708> my statutes וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <WH6213> and do אֹתָ֑ם <WH853> אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> them I [am] the LORD מְקַדִּשְׁכֶֽם׃ <WH6942> which sanctify

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> For every אִ֗ישׁ <WH376> one אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who יְקַלֵּ֧ל <WH7043> that curseth אֶת־ <WH853> אָבִ֛יו <WH1> his father וְאֶת־ <WH853> אִמּ֖וֹ <WH517> or his mother מ֣וֹת <WH4191> shall be surely יוּמָ֑ת <WH4191> put to death אָבִ֧יו <WH1> his father וְאִמּ֛וֹ <WH517> or his mother קִלֵּ֖ל <WH7043> he hath cursed דָּמָ֥יו <WH1818> his blood בּֽוֹ׃

וְאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> And the man אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who יִנְאַף֙ <WH5003> that committeth adultery אֶת־ <WH854> for אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> wife אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> with [another] man's אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יִנְאַ֖ף <WH5003> [even he] that committeth adultery אֶת־ <WH854> for אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> wife רֵעֵ֑הוּ <WH7453> with his neighbour's מֽוֹת־ <WH4191> shall surely יוּמַ֥ת <WH4191> be put to death הַנֹּאֵ֖ף <WH5003> the adulterer וְהַנֹּאָֽפֶת׃ <WH5003> and the adulteress

וְאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> And the man אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who יִשְׁכַּב֙ <WH7901> that lieth אֶת־ <WH854> for אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> wife אָבִ֔יו <WH1> with his father's עֶרְוַ֥ת <WH6172> nakedness אָבִ֖יו <WH1> his father's גִּלָּ֑ה <WH1540> hath uncovered מֽוֹת־ <WH4191> of them shall surely יוּמְת֥וּ <WH4191> be put to death שְׁנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH8147> both דְּמֵיהֶ֥ם <WH1818> their blood בָּֽם׃

וְאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> And if a man אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who יִשְׁכַּב֙ <WH7901> lie אֶת־ <WH854> with כַּלָּת֔וֹ <WH3618> with his daughter in law מ֥וֹת <WH4191> of them shall surely יוּמְת֖וּ <WH4191> be put to death שְׁנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH8147> both תֶּ֥בֶל <WH8397> confusion עָשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> they have wrought דְּמֵיהֶ֥ם <WH1818> their blood בָּֽם׃

וְאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> If a man אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who יִשְׁכַּ֤ב <WH7901> also lie אֶת־ <WH854> with זָכָר֙ <WH2145> with mankind מִשְׁכְּבֵ֣י <WH4904> as he lieth אִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> with a woman תּוֹעֵבָ֥ה <WH8441> an abomination עָשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> of them have committed שְׁנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH8147> both מ֥וֹת <WH4191> they shall surely יוּמָ֖תוּ <WH4191> be put to death דְּמֵיהֶ֥ם <WH1818> their blood בָּֽם׃

וְאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> And if a man אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who יִקַּ֧ח <WH3947> take אֶת־ <WH853> אִשָּׁ֛ה <WH802> a wife וְאֶת־ <WH853> אִמָּ֖הּ <WH517> and her mother זִמָּ֣ה <WH2154> it [is] wickedness הִ֑וא <WH1931> he בָּאֵ֞שׁ <WH784> with fire יִשְׂרְפ֤וּ <WH8313> they shall be burnt אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> וְאֶתְהֶ֔ן <WH853> וְלֹא־ <WH3808> will be no תִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become זִמָּ֖ה <WH2154> both he and they that there be no wickedness בְּתוֹכְכֶֽם׃ <WH8432> among

וְאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> And if a man אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who יִתֵּ֧ן <WH5414> add שְׁכָבְתּ֛וֹ <WH7903> lie בִּבְהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> with a beast מ֣וֹת <WH4191> he shall surely יוּמָ֑ת <WH4191> be put to death וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַבְּהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> the beast תַּהֲרֹֽגוּ׃ <WH2026> and ye shall slay

וְאִשָּׁ֗ה <WH802> And if a woman אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who תִּקְרַ֤ב <WH7126> approach אֶל־ <WH413> about כָּל־ <WH3605> any בְּהֵמָה֙ <WH929> unto any beast לְרִבְעָ֣ה <WH7250> and lie down אֹתָ֔הּ <WH854> for וְהָרַגְתָּ֥ <WH2026> thereto thou shalt kill אֶת־ <WH853> הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> the woman וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַבְּהֵמָ֑ה <WH929> and the beast מ֥וֹת <WH4191> they shall surely יוּמָ֖תוּ <WH4191> be put to death דְּמֵיהֶ֥ם <WH1818> their blood בָּֽם׃

וְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> And if a man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יִקַּ֣ח <WH3947> shall take אֶת־ <WH853> אֲחֹת֡וֹ <WH269> his sister בַּת־ <WH1323> daughter אָבִ֣יו <WH1> his father's א֣וֹ <WH176> or בַת־ <WH1323> daughter אִ֠מּוֹ <WH517> his mother's וְרָאָ֨ה <WH7200> and see אֶת־ <WH853> עֶרְוָתָ֜הּ <WH6172> her nakedness וְהִֽיא־ <WH1931> and she תִרְאֶ֤ה <WH7200> and she see אֶת־ <WH853> עֶרְוָתוֹ֙ <WH6172> his nakedness חֶ֣סֶד <WH2617> it [is] a wicked thing ה֔וּא <WH1931> and they וְנִ֨כְרְת֔וּ <WH3772> and they shall be cut off לְעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> in the sight בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the sons עַמָּ֑ם <WH5971> of their people עֶרְוַ֧ת <WH6172> nakedness אֲחֹת֛וֹ <WH269> his sister's גִּלָּ֖ה <WH1540> he hath uncovered עֲוֹנ֥וֹ <WH5771> his iniquity יִשָּֽׂא׃ <WH5375> he shall bear

וְ֠אִישׁ <WH376> And if a man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יִשְׁכַּ֨ב <WH7901> shall lie אֶת־ <WH854> for אִשָּׁ֜ה <WH802> with a woman דָּוָ֗ה <WH1739> having her sickness וְגִלָּ֤ה <WH1540> and shall uncover אֶת־ <WH853> עֶרְוָתָהּ֙ <WH6172> her nakedness אֶת־ <WH853> מְקֹרָ֣הּ <WH4726> her fountain הֶֽעֱרָ֔ה <WH6168> he hath discovered וְהִ֕יא <WH1931> and she גִּלְּתָ֖ה <WH1540> and she hath uncovered אֶת־ <WH853> מְק֣וֹר <WH4726> the fountain דָּמֶ֑יהָ <WH1818> of her blood וְנִכְרְת֥וּ <WH3772> of them shall be cut off שְׁנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH8147> and both מִקֶּ֥רֶב <WH7130> from among עַמָּֽם׃ <WH5971> their people

וְעֶרְוַ֨ת <WH6172> the nakedness אֲח֧וֹת <WH269> sister אִמְּךָ֛ <WH517> of thy mother's וַאֲח֥וֹת <WH269> sister אָבִ֖יךָ <WH1> nor of thy father's לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תְגַלֵּ֑ה <WH1540> And thou shalt not uncover כִּ֧י <WH3588> for אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁאֵר֛וֹ <WH7607> his near kin הֶעֱרָ֖ה <WH6168> for he uncovereth עֲוֹנָ֥ם <WH5771> their iniquity יִשָּֽׂאוּ׃ <WH5375> they shall bear

וְאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> And if a man אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who יִשְׁכַּב֙ <WH7901> shall lie אֶת־ <WH854> with דֹּ֣דָת֔וֹ <WH1733> with his uncle's wife עֶרְוַ֥ת <WH6172> nakedness דֹּד֖וֹ <WH1730> his uncle's גִּלָּ֑ה <WH1540> he hath uncovered חֶטְאָ֥ם <WH2399> their sin יִשָּׂ֖אוּ <WH5375> they shall bear עֲרִירִ֥ים <WH6185> childless יָמֻֽתוּ׃ <WH4191> they shall die

וְאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> And if a man אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יִקַּ֛ח <WH3947> shall take אֶת־ <WH853> אֵ֥שֶׁת <WH802> wife אָחִ֖יו <WH251> his brother's נִדָּ֣ה <WH5079> it [is] an unclean thing הִ֑וא <WH1931> he עֶרְוַ֥ת <WH6172> nakedness אָחִ֛יו <WH251> his brother's גִּלָּ֖ה <WH1540> he hath uncovered עֲרִירִ֥ים <WH6185> they shall be childless יִהְיֽוּ׃ <WH1961> are therefore

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֤ם <WH8104> Ye shall therefore keep אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all חֻקֹּתַי֙ <WH2708> all my statutes וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all מִשְׁפָּטַ֔י <WH4941> and all my judgments וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <WH6213> and do אֹתָ֑ם <WH853> וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not תָקִ֤יא <WH6958> therein spue you not out אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> them that the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> to which אֲנִ֜י <WH589> I am מֵבִ֥יא <WH935> whither I bring אֶתְכֶ֛ם <WH853> שָׁ֖מָּה <WH8033> in it לָשֶׁ֥בֶת <WH3427> you to dwell בָּֽהּ׃

וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> shall not תֵֽלְכוּ֙ <WH1980> follow בְּחֻקֹּ֣ת <WH2708> in the manners הַגּ֔וֹי <WH1471> of the nation אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I מְשַׁלֵּ֖חַ <WH7971> which I cast out מִפְּנֵיכֶ֑ם <WH6440> before כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> these עָשׂ֔וּ <WH6213> you for they committed וָאָקֻ֖ץ <WH6973> all these things and therefore I abhorred בָּֽם׃

וָאֹמַ֣ר <WH559> But I have said לָכֶ֗ם אַתֶּם֮ <WH859> you תִּֽירְשׁ֣וּ <WH3423> unto you Ye shall inherit אֶת־ <WH853> אַדְמָתָם֒ <WH127> their land וַאֲנִ֞י <WH589> Myself אֶתְּנֶ֤נָּה <WH5414> and I will give לָכֶם֙ לָרֶ֣שֶׁת <WH3423> it unto you to possess אֹתָ֔הּ <WH853> אֶ֛רֶץ <WH776> it a land זָבַ֥ת <WH2100> that floweth חָלָ֖ב <WH2461> with milk וּדְבָ֑שׁ <WH1706> and honey אֲנִי֙ <WH589> Myself יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> I [am] the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> your God אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who הִבְדַּ֥לְתִּי <WH914> which have separated אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> מִן־ <WH4480> from הָֽעַמִּֽים׃ <WH5971> you from [other] people

וְהִבְדַּלְתֶּ֞ם <WH914> Ye shall therefore put difference בֵּֽין־ <WH996> between הַבְּהֵמָ֤ה <WH929> beasts הַטְּהֹרָה֙ <WH2889> between clean לַטְּמֵאָ֔ה <WH2931> and unclean וּבֵין־ <WH996> and between הָע֥וֹף <WH5775> fowls הַטָּמֵ֖א <WH2931> and between unclean לַטָּהֹ֑ר <WH2889> and clean וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תְשַׁקְּצ֨וּ <WH8262> abominable אֶת־ <WH853> נַפְשֹֽׁתֵיכֶ֜ם <WH5315> and ye shall not make your souls בַּבְּהֵמָ֣ה <WH929> by beast וּבָע֗וֹף <WH5775> or by fowl וּבְכֹל֙ <WH3605> anything אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which תִּרְמֹ֣שׂ <WH7430> or by any manner of living thing that creepeth הָֽאֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> on the ground אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הִבְדַּ֥לְתִּי <WH914> which I have separated לָכֶ֖ם לְטַמֵּֽא׃ <WH2930> from you as unclean

וִהְיִ֤יתֶם <WH1961> become לִי֙ קְדֹשִׁ֔ים <WH6918> And ye shall be holy כִּ֥י <WH3588> for קָד֖וֹשׁ <WH6918> [am] holy אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto me for I the LORD וָאַבְדִּ֥ל <WH914> and have severed אֶתְכֶ֛ם <WH853> מִן־ <WH4480> from הָֽעַמִּ֖ים <WH5971> you from [other] people לִהְי֥וֹת <WH1961> become לִֽי׃
